DOC.brief_summary: The diagnostic cervical branch block neck pain due cervical facet joint pain traditionally do fluoroscopic guidance . Its diagnostic value technique well establish . However , recently study show diagnostic cervical lumbar medial branch block do ultrasound guidance .
DOC.brief_title: Ultrasound Guided Diagnostic Cervical Medial Branch Block
DOC.criteria: healthy volunteer patient headache , neck pain , shoulder pain due possible facet joint disease patients/volunteers BMI > 35 patients/volunteers short thick neck coagulopathy allergy local anesthetic , ultrasound gel patient unable fill post procedure pain diary
